code: import _asyncToGenerator from"@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator";import{API_BASE_URL}from"../constants/API";var AuthServices={login:function(){var _login=_asyncToGenerator(function*(email,password){try{var response=yield fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}auth/login/`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})});var user=yield response.json();return user;}catch(error){console.error("Error al autenticar:",error);throw error;}});function login(_x,_x2){return _login.apply(this,arguments);}return login;}(),signup:function(){var _signup=_asyncToGenerator(function*(email,password){try{var response=yield fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}auth/register/`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})});var data=yield response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error("Error al registra el usuario",error);throw error;}});function signup(_x3,_x4){return _signup.apply(this,arguments);}return signup;}(),logout:function(){var _logout=_asyncToGenerator(function*(accessToken){try{var response=yield fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}auth/logout/`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:`Bearer ${accessToken}`},body:JSON.stringify({accessToken:accessToken})});var data=yield response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error("Error al cerrar sesion:",error);throw error;}});function logout(_x5){return _logout.apply(this,arguments);}return logout;}()};export default AuthServices;
